snippet: The regional carrier has lost business and suffered mounting debt, leading to the filing for reorganization under Chapter 11.
lead_paragraph: The regional carrier has lost business and suffered mounting debt, leading to the filing for reorganization under Chapter 11.

headline.seo: Pinnacle Airlines Files for Bankruptcy Protection
